item.title: ‘Before We Forget’ Review: Treacly Gay Coming-of-Age Tale Feels Stuck Imitating ‘Call Me by Your Name’
item.description: The autobiographical film is always an attempt to embalm and embrace what’s long past. To look back and reshape one’s own memories with the help of a camera is to wrestle not just with what happened b
